backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user, business, customer, service item, receipt, and payment types with access-controlled CRUD operations tied to caller principals.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature-to-file mappings and evidence metadata for implemented app functionality with feature IDs, related files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files including hooks, components, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the SPA root and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, authentication gating, profile setup flow, and global providers for the React app.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal form allowing new authenticated users to submit and save their profile information.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main page layout with header, navigation, footer, and outlet for routed pages.
frontend/src/components/payments/AddPaym: Dialog component for adding a payment, validating input, constructing a Payment object, and submitting via useAddPayment.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Placeholder component showing payment history info, relying on parent receipt data.
frontend/src/components/print/PrintableR: Renders a printable receipt with business info, items, totals, and payment history.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor using the current identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBusinessProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching and updating the business profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hook for retrieving the callerâ€™s user profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomers.ts: Hooks for fetching customers and adding a new customer via backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePayments.ts: Hooks to fetch a receipt's payments and add new payments, invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useReceipts.ts: Hooks for fetching sorted receipts and creating new receipts via backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceItems.ts: Hooks for fetching and adding service items from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables with print-specific styling rules.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Provides helpers for formatting and parsing currency and calculating totals and balances using bigint values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Landing/LandingPage.t: Renders the marketing landing page with feature highlights and login buttons.
frontend/src/pages/Receipts/ReceiptDetai: Displays receipt details, line items, payments, and print options for a selected receipt.
frontend/src/pages/Receipts/ReceiptFormP: Implements the form for creating receipts, adding customers, service items, and line items.
frontend/src/pages/Receipts/ReceiptsEmpt: Shows an empty-state prompt encouraging users to create their first receipt.
frontend/src/pages/Receipts/ReceiptsList: Lists receipts with search and status filters, linking to detail pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters and storing or retrieving them from sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings, with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file defining app summary, required images, and a list of existing feature definitions with versions and requirement IDs.
